source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Twisted Appendage

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Ruthless Gladiator's Satin Hood

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 937,600 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 518,715.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and opponent's failed interrupt attempts grant Precognition

spells.description: Equip: While above 80% health, direct healing you do also redistributes up to 2% of your health to your target.
Equip: While above 80% health, direct healing you do also redistributes up to 2% of your health to your target.
Use: Removes all movement impairing effects and all effects which cause loss of control of your character. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

effects.display_string: Set: Increases your Intellect by 10% and your Stamina by 15% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant 7,831 primary stat for 20 sec.
